issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
I tried to install a new module 'com.mwaysolutions.barcode-android-0.2', and all other modules disappear from tiapp.xml, and then I couldn´t install any module anymore.

I´ve turned off the computer, clean the projects with no results. 

I´ve followed all the steps for installation, got a message success on installation, but the tiapp module box remains empty.

h3. Actual Result
Cant install any module

h3. Expected Result
Install modules
fields.summary: All modules installed disapear and I can´t install no modules

comments.body:
Hello,

Please use the latest Appcelerator Studio version and let us know if this is still an issue for you.

Thanks.
